version_description:
•Optimize UI for iPad, iPhone 6, iPhone 6 plus
•Smoother Fisheye PIP

What’s NEW in Ver. 3.2.3
PTZ preset location support
Distinguish whether server is in LAN or WAN environment automatically
Bug fixed

The HTTPS encrypted connection between iViewer and Camera/VAST/NVR
Displays static snapshot in the multi-cell view to save bandwidth.

- The HTTPS encrypted connection between iViewer and Camera / VAST / NVR
- Support two way audio for camera
- Support VAST substation

- Timeline Playback
- Multiple Layout Liveview
- Fisheye Dewarp Display in Liveview Page
- DO Control for Camera
- Hardware Decode for H.264
- Integration of VAST Windows AD Log-in
- Displays Static Snapshot in Multi-Cell View to Save Bandwidth

• Timeline Playback
• Multiple Layout Liveview
• Fisheye Dewarp Display in Liveview Page
• DO Control for Camera
• Hardware Decode for H.264
• Integration of VAST Windows AD Log-in for VAST v1.12 or above
• Displays Static Snapshot in Multi-Cell View to Save Bandwidth
• Bug fix

version_name: 3.9.4• New Camera View UI• Support Multi-Sensor Camera Panoramic View• Virtual Joystick for Speed Dome Camera• Support Speed Dome Pan

version_description:
What’s New in Version 3.9.4
• New Camera View UI
• Support Multi-Sensor Camera Panoramic View
• Virtual Joystick for Speed Dome Camera
• Support Speed Dome Pan, Patrol, Preset, Tracking Function (SD-9000 series)

- Support iPhone X
- Enhance remote access stability

What’s New in Version 3.10.101
- General bug fix

What’s New in Version 3.10.601
• General bug fix

• Search NVRs, VAST or substation in Device list.
• Support Face ID, Touch ID, PIN to lock app by enabling Protection.
• Notifications is renamed as Announcement.
• We have enhanced the security of iViewer, therefore jailbroken and rooted devices are not able to use it.
• Bug fixed: color issues under Dark Mode
• Bug fixed: device list might not work properly.

• Add support for Arabic, Japanese, German and Spanish language
• General bug fixes
